name: JVF Consulting
tag_list: web-design, seo, cms, ecommerce, software-development, iphone-applications
overview:
JVF Consulting provides custom solutions to remove the stress of maintaining your website. Offering compelling designs for today’s fast paced markets, we build our websites from the ground up to achieve our client’s goals.

Based in the Bay Area, we’re experts at custom web design, development, eCommerce, marketing, graphic design, mobile applications and much more! We use powerful business solutions that deliver results, leveraging our proven SEO techniques, saving you time and money. Whether you’re starting up your company, looking for a chance to redesign your brand or to digitize your daily tasks, Think Solutions, think JVF Consulting…
